# OpenHack MDWH - Azure Synapse Analytics Demo

## Challenge 4 - More than meets the eye - Sales Data

#### Project URL
- <https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse>

#### Developer
Andre Essing
- <https://www.andre-essing.de/>
- <https://github.com/aessing>
- <https://twitter.com/aessing>
- <https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/>

> THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

from pyspark.sql.types import StringType, TimestampType, DateType, IntegerType, DecimalType, BooleanType, StructType
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, lit, udf, greatest, upper
import uuid

# Read data from lake
df_Southridge_Orders = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/Southridge/CloudSales/dbo.Orders.parquet',
                        format='parquet',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_Southridge_Orders.printSchema()
#display(df_Southridge_Orders.limit(100))

# Read data from lake
df_Southridge_OrderDetails = spark.read.load('abfss://movies@demosynapsedls01.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/Southridge/CloudSales/dbo.OrderDetails.parquet',
                        format='parquet',
                        inferSchema=True,
                        header=True, 
                        ignoreLeadingWhiteSpace=True, 
                        ignoreTrailingWhiteSpace=True
                        )

# Display dataframe
#df_Southridge_OrderDetails.printSchema()
#display(df_Southridge_OrderDetails.limit(100))

# Join dataframes
df_Southridge_Orders_Joined = (
    df_Southridge_Orders_Renamed.alias('Orders').join(
        df_Southridge_OrderDetails_Renamed.alias('OrderDetails'),
        df_Southridge_Orders_Renamed.OrderID == df_Southridge_OrderDetails_Renamed.OrderID,
        'left'
    )
)

# Display dataframe
#df_Southridge_Orders_Joined.printSchema()
#display(df_Southridge_Orders_Joined.limit(100))

# Add columns
df_Southridge_Orders_Modified = (
    df_Southridge_Orders_Joined.withColumn("SourceSystemID", lit("1").cast(IntegerType()))
)

# Reorder colums
df_Southridge_Orders_Modified = df_Southridge_Orders_Modified.select(
    'SourceSystemID',
    'Orders.OrderId',
    'Orders.CustomerID',
    'OrderDate',
    'ShipDate',
    'TotalCost',
    'OrderCreatedDate',
    'OrderUpdatedDate',
    'OrderDetailID',
    'MovieID',
    'Quantity',
    'UnitCost',
    'LineNumber',
    'OrderDetailCreatedDate',
    'OrderDetailUpdatedDate'
)

# Rename columns
df_Southridge_Orders_Modified = (
    df_Southridge_Orders_Modified.withColumnRenamed("OrderId", "SourceSystemOrderID")
)

# Convert column types
df_Southridge_Orders_Modified = (
    df_Southridge_Orders_Modified.withColumn("SourceSystemID", col("SourceSystemID").cast(IntegerType()))
                           .withColumn("SourceSystemOrderID", upper(col("SourceSystemOrderID").cast(StringType())))
                           .withColumn("CustomerID", upper(col("CustomerID").cast(StringType())))
                           .withColumn("OrderDate", col("OrderDate").cast(DateType()))
                           .withColumn("ShipDate", col("ShipDate").cast(DateType()))
                           .withColumn("TotalCost", col("TotalCost").cast(DecimalType()))
                           .withColumn("OrderCreatedDate", col("OrderCreatedDate").cast(DateType()))
                           .withColumn("OrderUpdatedDate", col("OrderUpdatedDate").cast(DateType()))
                           .withColumn("OrderDetailID", upper(col("OrderDetailID").cast(StringType())))
                           .withColumn("MovieID", upper(col("MovieID").cast(StringType())))
                           .withColumn("Quantity", col("Quantity").cast(IntegerType()))
                           .withColumn("UnitCost", col("UnitCost").cast(DecimalType()))
                           .withColumn("LineNumber", col("LineNumber").cast(IntegerType()))
                           .withColumn("OrderDetailCreatedDate", col("OrderDetailCreatedDate").cast(DateType()))
                           .withColumn("OrderDetailUpdatedDate", col("OrderDetailUpdatedDate").cast(DateType()))
)

# Display dataframe
#df_Southridge_Orders_Modified.printSchema()
#display(df_Southridge_Orders_Modified.limit(100))

# Add columns
df_unioned_withID = df_unioned.withColumn("GlobalOrderID", uuidUDF())

# Order columns
df_unioned_withID = df_unioned_withID.select(
    'SourceSystemID',
    'GlobalOrderID',
    'SourceSystemOrderID',
    'CustomerID',
    'OrderDate',
    'ShipDate',
    'TotalCost',
    'OrderCreatedDate',
    'OrderUpdatedDate',
    'OrderDetailID',
    'MovieID',
    'Quantity',
    'UnitCost',
    'LineNumber',
    'OrderDetailCreatedDate',
    'OrderDetailUpdatedDate'
)

# Display dataframe
#df_unioned_withID.printSchema()
#display(df_unioned_withID.limit(100))
